mapper.sql: permission_id, permission_url, permission_name, permission_status, permission_type, permission_parentid, permission_createuser, permission_createdate, permission_modifyuser, permission_modifydate, permission_sortid
mapper.insert: insert into demo_permission (permission_id, permission_url, permission_name, permission_status, permission_type, permission_parentid, permission_createuser, permission_createdate, permission_modifyuser, permission_modifydate, permission_sortid) values (#{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{permissionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{permissionType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{permissionParentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{permissionCreateuser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{permissionCreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{permissionModifyuser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{permissionModifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{permissionSortid,jdbcType=BIGINT})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

mapper.update:
update demo_permission
permission_url = #{permissionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
permission_name = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
permission_status = #{permissionStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
permission_type = #{permissionType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
permission_parentid = #{permissionParentid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
permission_createuser = #{permissionCreateuser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
permission_createdate = #{permissionCreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
permission_modifyuser = #{permissionModifyuser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
permission_modifydate = #{permissionModifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
permission_sortid = #{permissionSortid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update demo_permission set permission_url = #{permissionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_name = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_status = #{permissionStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, permission_type = #{permissionType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, permission_parentid = #{permissionParentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, permission_createuser = #{permissionCreateuser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, permission_createdate = #{permissionCreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, permission_modifyuser = #{permissionModifyuser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, permission_modifydate = #{permissionModifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, permission_sortid = #{permissionSortid,jdbcType=BIGINT} where permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
FROM demo_user_role AS hur INNER JOIN demo_role_permission AS hrp ON hur.user_role_rid = hrp.role_permission_rid AND hrp.role_permission_status = 1 INNER JOIN demo_permission AS hp ON hrp.role_permission_pid = hp.permission_id AND hp.permission_status = 1 WHERE hur.user_role_uid = #{userRoleUid,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY hp.permission_parentid, permission_sortid

SELECT hp.permission_id, hp.permission_url, hp.permission_name, hp.permission_type, hp.permission_parentid, hp.permission_sortid FROM demo_permission AS hp WHERE permission_status = 1 ORDER BY hp.permission_parentid, hp.permission_sortid;

SELECT hp.permission_id, hp.permission_url, hp.permission_name, hp.permission_type, hp.permission_parentid, hp.permission_sortid FROM demo_permission AS hp INNER JOIN demo_role_permission AS hrp ON hp.permission_id = hrp.role_permission_pid AND hrp.role_permission_status = 1 WHERE permission_status = 1 AND hrp.role_permission_rid = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY hp.permission_parentid, hp.permission_sortid;
